# mssql_user (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mssql_login" "example" {
  name = "example"
  password = "example"
}

resource "mssql_user" "example" {
  name = mssql_login.example.name
  database = "example-db"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **database** (String)
- **name** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
